column4: oh ya btw when I start to run alot of apps together on my netbook my system freezes/crashes  even though the applications don't take up all the ram and I have to hard reboot it anyone know why ?
could be u dont have enough swap
I thought that too but I checked and my usb install(installed to computer mem from usb) partitioned in 3 gigs of swap
strange .. 3gigs shoud be more than enough .. updated your kernel .. try booting off the earlier one
but when I have system monitor up it shows that right before crashing I'm only using about 300mb of a gig of ram
it did this on the newest version and the one the system came installed with
its scares me when it does that
and if it crashes while playing music it will repeat the last few seconds like a vinyl does when it skips
newest stable version of ubuntu netbook remix 10.04
and it freezes sometimes while I'm actively using it
and I use this for school and stuff and even though it hasen't happened I'm worried that it will messing up my workflow and costing me time to reboot. also I'm worried of loosing files
maybe this will help to keep u sane till u find the issue .. backintime.le-web .o r g
ok thanks, I figure it out later I'm currently on another comp
sorry could not help ... BackInTIme will at least save your data
